title: Basic Smoke Test
custom_preconds: A complete build of the system
custom_steps:
Start up each service.
Terminate each service
custom_expected:
Validate that each service comes up properly and is healthy.
Validate that each service shuts down properly and cleanly
Validate the database contains no data.

title: Contest is created
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Shut down each service.
custom_expected:
Validate that the contest table in the database is updated with the gamepk 
Validate that there is at least one SWISH proposition in the propositions table (source = SWISH) 
Validate that there are at least 2 and no more than 5 pre-game At-Bat propositions 
Validate that all propositions are in the OPEN state

title: Contests are added to contest table in Postgres db
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
custom_expected: Validate that the contest is added to the contests table of the rally-replay schema in the Postgres database

title: Propositions are added to proposition table in Postgres db
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
custom_expected: Validate that the at-bat propositions are stored in the propositions table under rally-replay in the Postgres database.

title: End of game - states goes to RESOLVED/WITHDRAWN
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Set replay time to end of game.
Send end of game BOSS and GUMBO messages
custom_expected:
Validate that the end of game linescore is sent to pubsub
Validate that the pre-game props are set to either RESOLVED or WITHDRAWN.

title: Start of Game - states all go to OPEN/LOCKED
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the first half inning
custom_expected:
Validate that propositions go to LOCKED
Validate that the pregame propositions remain OPEN

title: End of Game - Game goes to CLOSED
custom_preconds: Run through the ninth inning of a game
custom_steps:
Start all services
Run through stored innings through the ninth
Validate status of game in Postgres DB
custom_expected: Database status of game is CLOSED.

title: Contest JSON object is received by Pub/Sub topic
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected:
Validate that each Pub/Sub message has the proper contest ID
Validate that there are at least 2 Pub/Sub messages

title: Contest JSON object adheres to the data contract
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected: PubSub JSON messages conform to the data contract

title: Pregame Prop JSON object is received by the Pub/Sub topic
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected:
At least one pre-game proposition is captured during the run and conforms to the data contract.
Validate at least one proposition received.
Validate the proposition matches the information stored in the proposition table.
Validate the proposition contains the contest ID from the contests table for this gamepk

title: Pregame Prop JSON object adheres to the data contract
custom_preconds: Requires that the data contract work is complete for propositions
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
custom_expected: Validate JSON fits data contract.

title: JSON pub sub messages contain proper contest ID
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
custom_expected: Validate that all proposition pubsub messages contain the contest id from the database table.

title: JSON pub sub messages contain proper gamepk ID
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
custom_expected: Validate that all pub sub messages contain the proper gamePk id from the Postgres database.

title: At-Bat Prop JSON object is received by the Pub/Sub topic
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected:
Verify that At-Bat prop is created and sent to PubSub.
Verify that At-Bat prop is created in database
Verify that At-Bat prop contains proper contest ID as found in database

title: At-Bat Prop JSON object adheres to the data contract
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected:
Verify that At-Bat prop is sent to PubSub topic
Verify that At-bat prop sent conforms to data contract (once available)

title: Linescore JSON object is received by the Pub/Sub topic
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing an event which satisfies a proposition
custom_expected: Validate that the linescore pub sub message is sent and contains proper data in proper format.

title: Linescore JSON object adheres to the data contract
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing a linescore (BOSS) event
custom_expected:
Validate that the pub sub linescore message is sent.
Validate that the pub sub linescore message conforms to the data contract (when available)

title: Validate pubsub messages contain venue information
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
custom_expected: Validate that all pub sub messages contain valid venue id's

title: Pregame props are created from Swish
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected:
The database will contain at least one pre-game property for the specified game with the source SWISH
At least one pub/sub message will be sent to the queue
The pub/sub message will contain the contest id from the game

title: Single Pregame prop is created if Swish doesn't have data
custom_steps:
Setup each service except SWISH
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected:
A single pre-game property with source SWISH will be created in the database.
At least one pub/sub message will be sent to the queue.

title: Pregame prop goes from open -> locked
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
custom_expected:
Proposition should be set to locked in database
JSON pub/sub message should be sent to pub sub with locked prop

title: Pregame prop goes from locked -> resolved
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing an event which satisfies a proposition
custom_expected:
Proposition affected by event moves from locked -> resolved.
JSON pub/sub message is sent with proper pub/sub information for proposition.

title: Pregame prop goes from locked -> voided
custom_steps:

Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
<TODO: What voids a proposition, as opposed to withdrawing it>?

title: Pregame prop goes from locked -> withdrawn
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the end of a half inning before the on-deck proposition begins.
custom_expected:
The on-deck and in the hole propositions are withdrawn since it will never occur in this half-inning
A JSON message is sent to the pub/sub queue containing the withdrawn proposition.

title: Pregame prop goes from open -> voided

title: At-Bat prop is created for choice of 2 and choice of 5 selection
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected: Validate that either 2 or 5 At-Bat propositions are created for the contest.

title: At-Bat prop goes from open -> locked
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
custom_expected:
Validate that the first proposition for the inning created during the 2 minute wait changes state from OPEN to LOCKED.
More generally, validate that there is at least one proposition in the LOCKED state in the db.
Validate that a JSON pub/sub message is sent for the proposition state change.

title: At-Bat prop is updated in Postgres db open -> locked
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
custom_expected: Validate that the at-bat prop is updated to locked in the Postgres database

title: At-Bat prop goes from locked -> resolved
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing an event which satisfies a proposition
custom_expected:
Verify that the at-bat propositions contain at least one that is in state "LOCKED"
Verify that the pre-game propositions remain in "LOCKED" state.
Verify that database is updated
Verify that JSON pubsub message is generated with new prop state.

title: At-Bat prop is updated in Postgres db locked ->resolved
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
Send JSON message for the half inning second batter.
custom_expected: Validate that the first at-bat prop for the inning is updated to resolved in the Postgres database.

title: At-Bat prop goes from locked -> voided
custom_preconds: ?? How does an at-bat prop get voided.

title: At-Bat prop is updated in Postgres db locked -> voided
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
Send JSON messages for the remainder of the inning, and the bottom half of the inning.
custom_expected: Validate that the final at-bat prop for the top of the inning is in a voided state in the Postgres database.

title: At-Bat prop goes from locked -> withdrawn
custom_preconds: ?? How does an at-bat prop get withdrawn.

custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing the half inning of an open proposition
Send JSON messages for the remainder of the inning, and the bottom half of the inning.
custom_expected: Validate that the final at-bat prop for the top of the inning is in a withdrawn state in the Postgres database.

title: At-Bat props are all resolved with end of inning
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing a linescore (BOSS) event
Send JSON message for end of inning
custom_expected: Validate that all locked at-bat props go to WITHDRAWN for that inning.

title: At-Bat props created with new half inning
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing a linescore (BOSS) event
Send JSON message for end of inning
Send JSON message for beginning of next half inning
custom_expected:
Validate that three new propositions are created for At-Bat, On Deck, and In the Hole for the new inning.
Validate pub sub messages are sent for all three propositions with proper data in the proper format.

title: On-Deck At-Bat prop is created
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
custom_expected:
Verify that At-Bat prop for second batter of game (on deck) is created in database.
Verify that At-Bat prop for second batter of game is sent to PubSub
Verify that state of At-Bat prop is "OPEN"

title: On-Deck At-Bat prop is transitioned to active At-Bat
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message for half inning to create AtBat and On Deck props
Send JSON message for first out of inning to close AtBat prop and promote OnDeck to AtBat
custom_expected:
Verify that initial AtBat proposition is properly created.
Verify that initial AtBat proposition is properly closed.
Verify that initial OnDeck proposition is now the active AtBat proposition

title: On-Deck At-Bat prop is voided at the end of the half inning
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message for half inning to create AtBat and On Deck props
Send JSON message for last out of the inning
custom_expected:
Verify that the current at-bat prop is RESOLVED
Verify that the previous OnDeck prop is VOIDED
Verify that the PubSub messages for both props are sent.

title: In-the-Hole At-Bat prop is created
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing an event which satisfies a proposition
custom_expected:
The active proposition should be resolved.
A new proposition should be created for in the hole.
The previous on deck proposition will become active.

title: In-the-Hole At-Bat prop is transitioned to On-Deck
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing an event which satisfies a proposition
custom_expected:
Validate that the previous in the hole proposition is now the on deck proposition and should be locked.
Validate that the previous on deck proposition will become the top at-bat proposition and should be locked.
Validate that a new in the hole proposition is created

title: In-the-Hole At-Bat prop is withdrawn at the end of the half inning
custom_steps:
Setup each service.
Set time in mock_stats_api service.
Wait 2 minutes.
Capture Pub/Sub messages
Send JSON message containing an event which satisfies a proposition
Send JSON message for end of inning
custom_expected:
Validate that the on deck and in the hole propositions have status set to WITHDRAWN.
Validate that the pub sub message is sent for the end of inning and change of propositions.

title: Verify that suspended game goes to CLOSED
Verify that any props for a suspended game are in VOIDED state
Verify that there are no duplicates in linescore properties sent (BDINT-2587)
custom_steps:
Retrieve GUMBO data for gamepk 632100, in the bottom of the 4th inning
Start Test Framework at 20200721_231900 (timecode)
Run GUMBO/BOSS data through the Test Framework
Confirm in the PubSub topic game_linescores that there is not a duplicate prop created for Asdrubal Cabrera
custom_expected:
Original Behavior - Two props were created for Asdrubal Cabrera. 
Expected Behavior - With the fixes in BDINT-2587, the problem in the GUMBO data would be correctly handled by casual-gaming-api, resulting in only a single prop created for Asdrubal Cabrera

title: Verify that seven inning games go to CLOSED.
custom_preconds: Given that a game is 7 innings (a double-header in 2020), and not postponed or suspended.
custom_steps:
Fetch the data for a specific 7 inning game, such as GamePk: 631470
Set the replay start time to 20200802_214759 (time code)
Play the full game back using the framework (publish_gumbos).
Wait for the state of the game to go to CLOSED.
Verify that the contest proposition has a state of CLOSED for a proposition sent to the pubsub.
custom_expected: The contest state should go to CLOSED.

title: Verify that at-bat properties are generated in order (1..)
custom_steps:
Fetch the data for a specific game, such as GamePk: 631223, inning 1.
Set the replay start time to 20200831_151500 (time code)
Play the full inning back using the framework (publish_gumbos).
Step through each of the contest propositions, verifying that each at-bat number (from the PROPOSITIONS | RELATIONS | ATBAT_NUMBER) increments by 0-1 (same values are ok).
Verify there are no missing or skipped values.
custom_expected: There will be no missing (i.e. at-bats 1, 4, 5, 6) or skipped (i.e. starts at 3) at-bat numbers.

title: Verify that propositions do not transition back to OPEN in any case.
custom_preconds:
The specific bug fix that this test case is designed to address is: BDINT-2625
The game illustrating the problem is gamePk 630950.
custom_steps:
Fetch the data for the gamePk using the fetch-data.py tool
Retrieve GUMBO data for gamepk 630950, in the bottom of the 4th inning
Start Test Framework at initial timecode for the game (extracted via the first GUMBO message for the game)
Run GUMBO/BOSS data through the Test Framework
Confirm in the PubSub topic game_linescores that the transition of the propositions never include multiple OPEN states
custom_expected: No messages will transition back to OPEN

title: Verify that pre-game GUMBO messages are not processed
custom_preconds: Create tests to validate any changes for BDINT-2595: Filter out nonchronological GUMBOsPENDING code changes.
custom_steps:
Fetch data for a known good game, such as gamePk 630101
Fetch data for a known game previous to the above game, such as gamePk 599361 (note that the actual games do not matter).
Set the playback time to 20200802_190200
Play back the GUMBO records for the first game, randomly interspersing them with records from the second game.
Verify that new messages only are sent to pub/sub.
Verify that props are not created for old messages
custom_expected:
Propositions are sent as expected for gamePk 630101
Propositions are NOT sent for gamePk 599361
Contest 599361 does not have an entry in the contest table, nor a contest proposition record.
